name: GameAI 2.0
author: tal
description:
Category: Game Screenshots
Purpose: PS2 textures, cartoonish and realistic game textures.

This model is intended to mainly handle PS2 compression and a mixture of Realistic and cartoonish textures, it's not meant to be used for very low resolution textures such as item icons.
dataset: Textures from A Hat in Time, Kingdom Hearts 3 and World of Final Fantasy. 21.9k to 70k textures, up to 1024x1024 per texture.
